analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Rollback.receiveApproval (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol#176-200):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(_from) (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol#188-190)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(_from,this,_value)) (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol#194-196)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- credits (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol)

Rollback.withdrawToken (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol#159-162) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_address,_amount) (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol#162)

Reentrancy in Rollback.receiveApproval (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol#176-200):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(_from) (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol#188-190)
	- require(bool)(token.transferFrom(_from,this,_value)) (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol#194-196)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalReturnedCredit (/unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x6de20d9d444354ff9b271a6ea6f9274f2467df35.sol:
